long.de,ru,uk:
This extension offers functionality that allows you to quickly search Wikipedia without leaving a tab where you currently are. To do this, simply open the pop-up window by hitting extension icon and enter your search query. The search can be made in 7 different languages, namely: English, German, Russian, Spanish, Portuguese, French and Italian.

Wikipedia is a trademark of the Wikimedia Foundation. This extension is not a part of it.

Please rate this extension or leave a review if you like it. Also feel free to contact me if you find a bug or an unexpected result. Thank you!
